text: Untuk interior bagus, estetik, instagramable, sanitary showernya bagus enak buat mandi. Yang menjadi catatan penting untuk perbaikan ada di pilihan menu buffet untuk sarapan dan makan malam (saya mengambil corporate group). Variant makanan untuk breakfast sangat terbatas, tidak sevariatif hotel lain, begitu pula penyajian omelette misalnya yang biasanya selalu fresh cooked di depan customer, ini sudah tersaji jadi tidak disajikan dalam kondisi fresh cooked di depan customer. Begitu pula tastenya harus memjadi concern untuk dinaikan kualitasnya. Hal penting lainnya adalah kebersihan gelas di kamar, petugas cleaning ternyata tidak mencuci gelas kotor yang sudah dipakai saat clean up kamar, petugas hanya menyiram nyiramkan air tanpa mengganti yang baru/steril atau setidaknya jika masih menggunakan gelas yang lama di uci dengan sabun sampai bersih. Gelas saya terlihat hanya sekedar disiram air sehingga masih menyisakan kotoran di gelas seperti pada foto terlampir.

text:
Mercure merupakan Hotel pilihan utama saat saya melakukan perjalanan dinas. Saya suka dari Mercure antara lain peralatan mandi yg disediakan sangat menghargai tamu. Sebagai contoh, sikat gigi yabg disediakan bukan sikat gigi yang kebanyakan disediakan oleh hotel lain. Handuk juga bersih, wangi dan lembut. 
Ruangan mendukung kampanye GoGreen, dimana kunci pintu dan kartu utk daya listrik jadi satu. Sehingga saat keluar kamar maka otomatis listrik diruangan terputus. 
Food and Baverage juga bervariasi dari makanan lokal, sampe yg int'l. 
Kartu/ kunci kamar juga hanya bisa ke lantai dimana kamar kita berada, sehingga meminimalisir kejadian lupa kamar di lantai berapa. 
Menginap di Mercure jauh dari kata Insecure.

text:
Menyenangkan sekali menginap 2 hari di Mercure Nexa Pettarani Makassar, apalagi saya dan suami sebagai member Accor All merasakan sekali benefit sebagai member di hotel ini, dapat upgrade kamar dan free breakfast dengan voucher kompliment khusus member Accor All.

Kami booking kamar dengan 2 type kamar yang berbeda pada malam sebelum keberangkatan kami sekeluarga dari Jakarta ke Makassar, lalu mengirimkan email mengenai arrangement kamar agar mendapatkan kamar yang berdekatan. Pada dini hari setelahnya email kami langsung dibalas dan kami juga dihubungi via whatsapp.

Alhamdulillah kami mendapat kamar dengan type yg berbeda di lantai yang sama dan berhadapan, namun sayang karena tingkat hunian hotel sedang tinggi (sepertinya sedang ada acara) kami mendapatkan kamar di lantai 6 yang merupakan kamar smooking. Untuk di kamar sih tidak terlalu tercium bau asap rokok, namun di lorong amat sangat tercium baunya, saran saya mungkin hotel dapat menambahkan ekstra exhaust fan atau air purifier di lorong lantai smooking tersebut.

Untuk kamar junior suite, ukurannya ternyata tidak terlalu besar namun cukuplah.. untuk kamar mandi hanya tersedia shower, toilet dan 1 wastafel, serta kelengkapan standar plus bathrobe.

Untuk kamar executive suite, terdapat 4 ruangan terpisah dengan sekat sliding door, yaitu :
1 ruangan tamu sekaligus ruangan makan yang terdapat 1 sofa panjang, meja, meja makan, 4 kursi makan, microwave, electric water kettle, kulkas 2 pintu, tempat sampah, namun sayang tidak tersedia perlengkapan makan seperti piring mangkok dan sendok garpu.
1 ruangan wardrobe dengan kelengkapan 2 lemari full kaca, safety box, dan papan setrika
1 ruangan kamar tidur dengan meja, timbangan badan, lemari kecil, serta sofa kecil
1 ruangan kamar mandi dengan bathtub, shower serta toilet terpisah dan wastafel dengan kelengkapan standar serta tempat sampah.
Sayang di kamar executive tidak ada bathrobe.

Kami sangat terkesan dengan kamar executivenya, walau tidak full karpet tidak mengapa karena kami memang tidak suka full karpet mengingat alergi yang saya idap.
Kamar cukup bersih dan dibersihkan setiap hari oleh petugas kebersihan kamar, serta kelengkapan kamar pun selalu ditambah dan handuk selalu diganti oleh petugas kebersihan kamar.
Berhubung kami mendapat komplimen buah-buahan ada baiknya pisau buah jangan diambil dulu saat dibersihkan, karena pada hari kedua saat buah-buahan kami masih ada, dan hendak kami konsumsi, kami repot perlu meminjam pisaunya lagi via telepon.

Untuk kedua kamar, baik juinor maupun executive, kami mendapat komplimen snack, minuman ringan bersoda dan buah-buahan. Senang sekali dengan bentuk perhatiannya.

Untuk restoran, makanan yang disediakan di buffet cukup beragam dan makan sarapan selama 2 hari berturut-turut kami mendapatkan menu yang berbeda sehingga tidak bosan.
Kami suka dengan table arrangement serta tata ruangan restoran yang cantik, serta terdapat pemisahan dengan ruangan terbuka/outdoor untuk tamu yang merokok.

Sebagai member Accor All kami mendapatkan voucher welcome drink yang dapat ditukarkan di cafe dengan 2 minuman untul setiap vouchernya. Variasi minuman yang dapat dipilih pun banyak, ada cappuchino, ice chocolate, jus, dan minuman ringan lainnya.

Untuk kolam renang yang berada di lantai dasar GF, standar-standar saja, tidak terlalu besar tapi cukuplah untuk anak-anak berenang.

+/+ Proses check in dan check out cukup cepat
+/+ Parkir gratis tanpa kartu parkir (self parking) dengan kapasitas parkir cukuo banyak
+/+ terdapat pengukur suhu tubuh di pintu masuk lobby dan automatic hand sanitizer spray di beberapa lokasi di lantai dasar
+/+ selama pandemi, pengunjung restoran untuk buffet sarapan diminta menggunakan sarung tangan plastik yang telah disediakan untuk memegang alat pengambil makanan/minuman
+/+ petugas hotel ramah-ramah dan cekatan
+/+ Hotel berada di jalan raya Pettarani

-/- karena saat kami menginap okupansi sedang tinggi karena ada acara, 3 lift yg tersedia terasa kurang karena kami sempat menunggu lift agak lama untuk naik turun
-/- agak jauh ke pantai losari sekitar 20 menit perjalanan dengan mobil
-/- karena parkir tanpa kartu/tiket agak perlu perhatian lebih untuk penjagaan keamanannya ya, karena mobil bebas keluar masuk hotel tanpa gerbang dan petugas pengecekan
-/- menemukan 1 kecoak berkeliaran di dekat wastafel dapur kamar eksekutif, bisa dilakukan pengecekan / pest kontrol lebih teratur lebih baik yaa

text:
Saya dan teman-teman reunian sambil Buka Puasa bersama di Mercure . Kami pilih mercure Karena lokasi nya yang easy access dan juga Karena Harga Bukber nya yang sangat affordable .
We did not expect much tapi pas nyampe kami semua tekesima Dengan begitu Variatif nya makanan yang disajikan , very well presented , eye catching 😊.
Pas Buka Puasa , wow, kami Coba Ta’jil nya dulu eh ternyata makanannya enak-enak , dan ini membuat kami ingin Coba  lebih Ke main dish nya .
Soto Banjar dan Mie Bakso nya sangat enak 👍👍.
Suasana hari itu sangat ramai Karena fully booked tapi kami tetap bisa enjoy Karena dapat spot meja yang OK banget , sangat spacious , terima kasih banyak buat Mas Asrul Jaya yang sudah bantu aturkan bookingannya . Walaupun kami banyak permintaan , minta direvisi berulang kali tapi Mas Asrul Tetap Sabar layani permintaan kami yang cukup banyak 😁.
Terakhir , hanya mau kasi Saran aja , untuk clear up Meja nya Kalau bisa lebih cepat Karena pas kita selesai Ta’jil trus pergi sholat , balik Ke Meja masih penuh (belum dibersihkan ) jadi pas ngambil main dish nya piring jadinya ketumpuk. 
Overall kami senang Buka Puasa di Mercure dan pasti akan balik lagi .
Terima kasih .

text:
Hotel yang tergolong baru dan memiliki lokasi sangat strategis di pusat Kota Makassar, berada di Jalan Pettarani. Lokasi juga dekat dengan perkantoran, kampus UNM, dan juga masjid terdapat persis di seberang jalan. Desain interior unik dan modern dan memiliki fasilitas tergolong lengkap, terdapat restoran, kolam renang, gym, dan spa.
Ukuran kamar tergolong cukup luas. Salah satu hal unik adalah lemari kamar yang menyatu dengan dinding toilet yang bisa dibuka.
Pada kesempatan menginap kali ini bertepatan dengan urusan kantor, sehingga terdapat rate khusus untuk corporate. Secara keseluruhan selama menginap di hotel ini, fasilitas dan harga cukup sepadan. Tetapi untuk Wi-Fi masih belum menjangkau setiap kamar dengan baik.

text: I have stayed at the Mercure in Makasar a few times on business. The staff are very friendly and helpful as you would expect in a Mercure! The hotel itself is very modern with a large airy lobby leading into the lounge and then the dining area, which also has an outdoor area. The rooms are first class, well appointed and modern with LCD TV,  Fridge, Tea, and Coffee facilitates. The shower and WC are very good however the shower head is not great more hose than shower. The beds are very comfortable and the air con is good. The menu is varied and the food is good, the breakfast too is varied and every time I have been the breakfast menu is different. As a European the only thing that is missing is a cold beer in the lounge bar!

text:
The room was very satisfactory, with a comfortable mattress and pillows. I particularly enjoyed the  excellent shower (strong water pressure, plenty of hot water, and a shower head that can be either fixed in its holder or handheld). The buffet breakfast was good. 

The one downside is that the hotel is situated directly on a major road, and the noise from the street is unrelenting. Earplugs are highly recommended if that sort of noise disturbs you. Or, of course, you can ask for a room at the rear of the hotel so you are not facing the street.

text:
I had a wedding event on 27 February 2022. Request of the wedding style was CSM (Chinese Set Menu). During the meetings for wedding arrangement and food testing everything seems went well but when the dinner comes everything isn't as what we discuss during the meeting.

- We have requested for additional room for family in King Size Bed but when it comes to check in they said the King Size is full and offer the Twin Bed to be put together into King Size. After complaining finally they agree to upgrade the room. But this kind of things actually no need to get complaint first to be sorted out especially we have wedding event on that day.
- Food should be come out each dish by dish but in actually it came out at the same time.
- Waiter should be serving food into per portion instead of just put the whole things in the table.
- Plate should be change after third menu but due all of the come out at the same time it didn't worked out.
- Shrimp were requested to be made into leng hong kien during food test but didn't being executed.
- Fish is totally out of questions which was stench and still had the smell of earth.
- Overall taste for the dishes is so different during the food test.

Overall for food and the service during wedding, it really disappointed me the most and it prove that this facility isn't ready yet to host for Wedding Event.

What Pros in this facility
- Located near Highway
- Spacious Parking Spot
- Room Design was unique and comfortable
title: Poor Food for Wedding Event

text:
I have go to makassar for funeral moment in "yayasan budi luhur makassar" 
I choose Mercure hotel as a priority because I am very near the location, and I am also a member of Accor plus. 
This horrible hotel location on Saturday night, peoples in the road contest the car, with high sound from tailpipe or exhaust car.
Sound from the road also very loud in the middle of the night.

I was angry on the second day at the hotel, while I am back in the night, and I get the card blocking by the hotel. 
The hotel gives me a reason for repayment or recharges from credit cards at around 11 PM, and previously the staff was confirmed by phone at 5.12 PM for compensation or recharge from the credit card. Why are they asking twice? And I think it is not good manners.
So I do not understand what benefit member or not, also the price sometimes more expensive using member benefit. 

Third, while breakfast, one of the staff from the kitchen takes the foods without mask or glove, somehow they touch the nose, I think not good in a covid moment like now. 

From my experience, I am not twice in this hotel, and also I am not interested in membership in Accor Plus for next time.
title: Great hotel but need improve the standard of staff and management.

owner_response.text:
Dear Bapak Dani,

We would like to express our deep condolences of your beloved mother's in low lost, may she rest  in peace. 

We aware that you spent a worst day in your life, though you found some unexpected things happen and might ruined your days. Let us express this apology on that unpleasant situation.

As confirmed earlier through a courtessy call by our team, we would like to confirm that the noise from the main road is everyone's problem, it is the activity of illegal drag race by irresponsible  people and we have complaint this disturbance many times to the local police, but it seems to be a never ending story.  Truly it is beyond our control and responsibility and the fact that it made us frustrated all the times.

Related the payment issue, we just implementing the right procedure to avoid fraudness of cyber transaction. We found that there was a difference between the booker's name and the payment authority. This called  our attention that we should protect  our customers data especially related with financial, therefore we made a confirmation to you and your wife just to ensure that the transaction is legal and valid. We learnt this from a very worst experience ever happen in our place and we try our best to not let this things happen again. 

Thank you for remind us of being concerned on health protocols, this should not be happen after we trained all staffs to implement this issue seriously. We will always remind all teams to respect on the issue. 

We do thank you for your valuable time on writing us some important feedbacks. 

We hope that this explanation clear enough to you. 

Last but not least, we are expecting to welcoming you again in the future with a better stay experience. 

Sincerely Yours,

Rury MASHURI (Mr.)
General Manager

text:
I booked the hotel on 8 January 2021 only for a night. I arrived in Makassar city after 12 hours long drive from Luwu utara, and it was so exhausted. FATIN the receptionist who helped me to check in, was extremely awesome I asked if it would be possible to check in earlier and she explained there is additional charge for early check in. But I am sure that the hotel was not fully booked so I asked for help if I do it early as I am one of the ACCOR Loyalty member. She recognized it and politely explain to me that there’s a room available with 2 single bed. I accepted it and that’s ok because all I needed just sleep. I went to the room and I saw the team has prepared the amenity and welcome note for me it was so clever and so hospitable. Also, Thanks to IKRAM who I believe the room attendant who I found in the floor and being so helpful to me and gave me couple of shaving kit and soaps. 

The only thing I’d like to share for HOUSEKEEPING team that the room is a bit moldy and the body fat was stained the wall in the bathroom. I hope that in the future they could’ve cleaned more as it was bit brown underneath the wall in the standing shower. Over all it was amazing stay and everybody I have encountered during my stay was helpful and nice. 

I would definitely recommended this new hotel to people out there! Thank you!
title: Tottally HEARTIST and genuine service!

text:
It is a new hotel, located in one of the main road in Makassar. Love the interior, the staff was very helpful and nice. 🥰

Stayed here during corona time and when we arrived at the lobby the hotel provided us with hand sanitizer, checked our temperature and did all other safety and cleanliness procedure. So we felt safe.😌

The pool location is inconvenient. Because it is right beside the lobby area. So people can see you from the lobby.🤭.

Me and my Mom wanted a bigger room so we booked for deluxe room with 2 single beds. but unfortunately there is only one deluxe room with 2 single beds. And it is on a non smoking floor.😔

So I decided to pay extra and upgraded us to the junior suite room. 

But unfortunately they only provided breakfast for 1 person which we find very unusual🧐. I had to pay IDR 120.000 for extra pax. But we thought maybe it’s the new rules during corona.

The junior suite room was clean, spacious, there is a sofa that can function as a small bed if needed and also there is a table with 2 chairs that can function as the working area or dining.

The bathroom was big, clean with standard amenities.

Ordered the room service and the service was fast and the food was delicious.🙂

Everything was good, but the noise from the main road during the night was really bad☹️

We got room 630, and the view is the main road. At night around 11pm - 1 am seems like there was an illegal street racing happening. And the motor bikes engine was revving like crazy!!! And we couldn’t sleep.

The second night of our stay was even worst! The illegal racing happened around 12-3am !! 😫. 

It would be nice if the hotel management can soundproof the walls better against external noise.

For anyone looking to stay here, I recommend you to avoid the main road side rooms.
title: Good experience but the noise from the road was unbearable.

owner_response.text:
Dear Ecigum,

Thank you for taking your time to write the review on your recent stay with us. It is exciting for us knowing you were enjoyed your stay and felt safe with our protocol preventing Covid19 spread in our hotel. We also glad that you were happy with our cleanliness, services & our foods.

We do apologize on your breakfast experience, there were misundertanding, we should offer you breakfast for 2 person in the rate as an alternative rather than 1 breakfast as stated on your benefit, so you don't need pay an extra breakfast, however we have  checked that your breakfast has been discounted by the team.

Regarding the noise from illegal drag-race took place in main road next to the hotel, this is truly beyond our control. We have reported many times to the police and the authorities, this was became nightmare in Makassar especially in the provincial main road where they made this irresponsible acts.

We will not stop reporting this issue, hoping that this is will be terminated soon.

We do hope above explanation are clear to you.

Thanks again for your feedbcak,  and looking forward to welcoming you again with more enjoyable experience. 

Sincerely,

Rury Mashuri - General Manager
